metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4348 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The _rsvg_css_normalize_font_size function in librsvg 2.40.2 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption and application crash) via circular definitions in an SVG document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4348` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-rsvg-2.0 - 2.40.13-3
librsvg2-2 - 2.40.13-3
librsvg2-bin - 2.40.13-3
librsvg2-common - 2.40.13-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: librsvg package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.40.13-3').
